meanings.definition: A person who rides a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: The cyclist pedaled swiftly down the street.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cyclist riding past the park.
meanings.sent3: The cyclist tried to balance on one wheel but ended up falling comically.
meanings.sent4: She was a lone cyclist in the sea of cars, navigating through the traffic.
meanings.sent5: The cyclist's bright red helmet made them easy to spot in the crowd.

meanings.definition: One who participates in cycling as a sport or recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: The cyclist trained hard for the upcoming race.
meanings.sent2: Many cyclists gathered at the starting line for the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The cyclist challenged a squirrel to a race around the park.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, he was a cyclist, always striving to reach new heights.
meanings.sent5: The cyclist's determination to conquer the steep hill was truly inspiring.
